sense.def:
A picture
je narisana ali naslikana podoba.

seg.quote: ...the most important picture Picasso ever painted.
He picked up a book to look at the pictures.

sense.def:
A picture
je tudi druga beseda za
a photograph
.

seg.quote: We all had our pictures taken.

sense.def:
Kadar oseba ali stvar
is pictured in a newspaper or magazine
, se pojavi na sliki v nekem časopisu ali reviji.

seg.quote: Murray was pictured in The Times.

sense.def:
A picture
je tudi tisto, kar vidimo na televizijskem zaslonu.

seg.quote: We have all seen television news pictures of their forces in action.

sense.def:
A picture
je tudi druga beseda za film.

seg.quote: We worked together in the last picture I made.

sense.def:
the pictures
pomeni isto kot
the cinema
.

seg.quote: She met him at the pictures.

sense.def:
Kadar ima človek
a picture of something
, si tisto predstavlja ali vidi v mislih.

seg.quote: A picture flashed through Kunta's mind of the panther springing at him.
They can get quite a distorted picture of what's going on.
He could picture all too easily the consequences of being caught.

sense.def:
To give a picture of what something is like
pomeni nekaj opisati.

seg.quote: Mr Hamilton gives a most interesting picture of Monty's family background.

sense.def:
The picture in a particular place
so razmere v nekem kraju.

seg.quote: In Nigeria, the picture appears to be different.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
puts someone in the picture
, tisti osebi pojasni podrobnosti določenega položaja.

seg.quote: Let me put you in the picture about the situation there.
